Starstorm;

The femme heard that and appeared in the same room "Doing what, 
Vlad?"after that she looking to phoenix and said "Looking the battle, 
Phoenix, are you willing to going to battle?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Vlad: I want something... If Starstorm makes it back alive, I want 
a 
> duel with her. I will destroy her and make certain she is never 
> remembered.
> 
> He continued to examine the battle and saw a flash he recognized as 
a 
> gauss slug. He then saw what seemed to be a Dire Wolf.
> 
> Vlad: Can you zoom on that fighter, quiaff?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Phoenix steps aside so Vlad has a better view. "All I know is 
that a 
> > couple of factions made an alliance against the Predacons, who 
> teamed 
> > up with the Rogues to make a pre-emptive strike.  Looks like it's 
> > starting to get messy."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Vlad suddenly became interested.
> > > 
> > > Vlad: Phoenix, tell me more about this attack.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > Phoenix sighs and turns away, unsure of how to cheer him up.  
> > Before 
> > > > she gets any inspiration on that front, she thinks of 
something 
> > > > else.  "Computer, what's happening with that attack force?"
> > > > 
> > > > "Scanning ... Predacon and Rogue forces have engaged Maximal 
> > > > troops."  The computer brings up a holographic image of the 
> > battle, 
> > > > which shows every indication of being a hellacious one.  
Phoenix 
> > > > shudders when she thinks of the welfare of those involved.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Vlad straightened back on the table again and closed his 
eyes.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Vlad: It matters not. No one here knows what I am talking 
> about 
> > > > when I 
> > > > > speak of caste or even of honor! How low can you machines 
be 
> so 
> > > > that 
> > > > > you do not even know about honor?!
> > > > > 
> > > > > He was tired and started to get depressed.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > "My name's Phoenix," the femme exlpains, "and as far as 
> caste 
> > is 
> > > > > > concerned ... well, my function is as a healer.  Does 
that 
> > > help?"
> > > > > >

> > > > > > > Vlad: Well, I suppose it is not your fault. What is 
your 
> > name, 
> > > > and 
> > > > > > > what caste do you belong to?
> > > > > > >

> wrote:
> > > > > > > > Phoenix shrugs.  "I'm new here, I don't know what the 
> > > > Predacons 
> > > > > > do 
> > > > > > > > with their prisoners."
